events.name: menuTransition
events.comment: Should the transition use the menu background?

events.name: endGameTransition
events.comment: Is the end game transition playing?

children.text: Unlocked Flies always reset opacity to 100.
Locked Flies reset differently depending on their current state.
Set blur to maximum value and increase opacity.

children.name: linkCount
children.comment: Number of links to this fly.

children.text: Setup the game when the layout loads.

parameters.text: replace(Self.Text, "##1##", "[color=#ffffff]TAP[/color] the screen to jump, then [color=#ffffff]ROTATE[/color] your device to move left and right.")
replace(Self.Text, "##1##", "Use the arrow/DPad [color=#ffffff]UP[/color] to jump, then [color=#ffffff]LEFT[/color] and [color=#ffffff]RIGHT[/color] to move the frog.")

children.text: Play gameplay music and ambience, if not already playing.
Go to next level and check if a new level has been unlocked.

children.functionDescription: Go to next level and check if a new level has been unlocked

actions.text: Player is not loading a new level from the menu.

children.text: If it's the last level, play ending animation.
Otherwise go to the next level.
If a new level has been unlocked, save it to the player's profile.
When the player beats the level, the frog says "Nice!", then a transition is played to the next level.

actions.text: Make particles go up and to a random horizontal direction.

children.text: After the particle has gone all the way up, make it fall and destroy it.

actions.text: Create slash effect and set the width according to the FrogSprite width sign.
Subtract 1 from the amount of flies.

children.text: Check if this fly should reveal a transparent fly.
If there is only one fly left, it must be the queen. Make it emerge from the ground.
Otherwise, if there is no more flies left, play the end game animation.
If it is not the last level and there are no flies left, the player has won the level.
When flies are done glowing, they disappear.
Setup mask and starting animation frame.
Make frog jump with an animation.

children.functionDescription: Make frog jump with an animation

actions.text: Make so that the frog can lose the game if it touches certain walls.

children.text: Frog hit a wall or barrier, therefore the level should reset.

children.functionDescription: Frog hit a wall or barrier, therefore the level should reset

actions.text: Disable collisions and the platformer behavior.
Make the frog bigger and transparent to look like its "popping".
Destroy frog and play level change transition.

children.text: When the frog touches a fly, the frog bounces off and smashes the fly.
When the frog collides with the tilemap, unless it's a NoLoss area, the player loses.
If the frog collides with a barrier, the player loses.
When the frog lands, it returns to its idle animation.
If the frog collides with a dash object, it dashes in the direction of the DashDestination area.

actions.text: Set frog width according to dash direction.
Set position and start the movement.

children.text: When the frog collides with a gravity inverter, the sign of the gravity is inverted.

actions.text: Invert frog and its sprite height sign.

children.text: Press switch to change barriers state.

actions.text: Wait a bit and reset animation.

children.text: The frog and the flies perturb grass on collision.
The frog and the flies perturb vines on collision.
The frog perturb Switch Bases on collision.
Exit current level and go to the main menu.

children.functionDescription: Exit current level and go to the main menu

children.text: Show virtual go to main menu button on mobile.
